Sentencas: In an islanded microgrid, while considering the complex nature of line impedance, the generalized droop control fails to share the actual real/reactive power between the distributed generation (DG) units.
Titulo: Artificial Neural Network Based Droop-Control Technique for Accurate Power Sharing in an Islanded Microgrid

Sentencas: To overcome this power sharing issue, in this paper a new approach based on feed forward neural network (FFNN) is proposed.
Titulo: Artificial Neural Network Based Droop-Control Technique for Accurate Power Sharing in an Islanded Microgrid

Sentencas: Also, the proposed FFNN based droop control method simultaneously controls the microgrid voltage and frequency within the limits.
Titulo: Artificial Neural Network Based Droop-Control Technique for Accurate Power Sharing in an Islanded Microgrid

Sentencas: The proposed microgrid consists of combination of photovoltaic (PV) system and battery energy storage system (BESS) as the first DG unit and solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) as the second DG unit.
Titulo: Artificial Neural Network Based Droop-Control Technique for Accurate Power Sharing in an Islanded Microgrid

Sentencas: The simulation of the proposed microgrid is carried out in Matlab/Simulink environment and necessary results are compared to show the effectiveness of the proposed method.
Titulo: Artificial Neural Network Based Droop-Control Technique for Accurate Power Sharing in an Islanded Microgrid
